title: Elegant Pearl Embellished Kundan Jhumka Earrings
features: These contemporary Jhumka earrings feature a delicate design crafted with high-quality kundan stones and gold polish. The Jhumka bells are suspended with a shell pearl. They blend traditional design with a contemporary aesthetic.
occasions: Suitable for a variety of festive events
adding a touch of traditional elegance to your look.
description: These Jhumka earrings combine the timeless appeal of kundan stones with a modern design, making them a versatile addition to any jewelry collection. The high-quality materials and craftsmanship ensure lasting beauty and elegance.
